info.title: BReaDv3 API
info.description:
BReaDv3 Production API
    
    A git-centric AI model fine-tuning platform that uses distributed git repositories 
    for coordination instead of traditional databases.
    
    Key Features:
    - Repository Management: Create and manage AI training repositories
    - Prompt Management: Store and organize training prompts
    - Target Management: Define training targets and configurations
    - Async Workflows: Git-based coordination for distributed training
    
    Authentication:
    All endpoints require authentication via Bearer token.
    
    API Structure:
    - /v1/repo/* - Repository operations
    - /v1/repo/{repo_name}/prompts/* - Prompt management
    - /v1/repo/{repo_name}/targets/* - Target management
    - /v1/repo/{repo_name}/bakes/* - Bake management

get.description: Returns repositories visible to the authenticated team. Use this to discover repo names for subsequent calls.

put.description: Creates the repository if missing or returns the existing one. Idempotent; base_model cannot be changed (409 on conflict).

409.description: Repository already exists - base_model is immutable

example.message: Repository 'my-repo' already exists with base_model 'Qwen/Qwen3-32B'. Repository base_model is immutable and cannot be changed.

get.description: Lists prompts in the repository for discovery and validation.
Returns the prompt definition and metadata.

put.description: Creates or updates a single prompt. Idempotent; invalid names return 422.

delete.description: Deletes a prompt from the repository.

put.description: Creates or updates multiple prompts. Idempotent; invalid names return 422.

get.description: Lists targets in the repository for discovery and validation.

put.description:
Create or update multiple targets (idempotent).

Targets are composed from a base template plus per-target overrides. The base template can be another target; overrides take precedence where specified.

Create or update a target (idempotent).

Targets are composed from a base template plus per-target overrides. The base template can be another target; overrides take precedence where specified.

delete.description: Deletes a target from the repository.

post.description:
Queue a stim (stimulus generation) job for the target.

Prereqs: target has stim configuration (u, v, generators).
Idempotent: repeated calls while a job exists return the current state (no duplicate jobs).

Async: returns immediately. Poll GET stim status to monitor and fetch results via GET stim output (paginated).

get.description:
Get paginated stim output data.

Returns the generated stimuli from the stim job.
Use offset and limit parameters to paginate through large datasets.

post.description:
Start a rollout (trajectory generation) job for the specified target.

The target must have:
- Completed stim job (stim output must exist)
- Configured rollout parameters (model_name is required)

This endpoint creates a job marker and returns immediately - job execution is asynchronous.

get.description:
Get paginated rollout output data.
    
    Returns the generated trajectories/responses from the rollout job.
    Use offset and limit parameters to paginate through large datasets.
Lists bakes in the repository for discovery and validation.

put.description:
Create or update multiple bakes (idempotent).

Bakes are composed from a base template plus per-bake overrides. The base template can be another bake; overrides take precedence where specified.

Create or update a bake (idempotent).

Bakes are composed from a base template plus per-bake overrides. The base template can be another bake; overrides take precedence where specified.

delete.description: Deletes a bake from the repository.

post.description:
Queue a bake (model training) job for the specified bake.

Prereqs: bake config is complete (datasets + training settings); all referenced targets have completed rollouts.
Idempotent: repeated calls while a job exists return the current state (no duplicate jobs).

Async: returns immediately. Poll GET bake to monitor (status/job) and access artifacts after completion.

RolloutOutputResponse.title: RolloutOutputResponse
RolloutOutputResponse.description:
Paginated rollout output response

Returns rollout job status along with paginated output data.

output.response: Python is a high-level programming language...

RolloutResponse.title: RolloutResponse
RolloutResponse.description:
Rollout job execution status

Inherits all fields from JobStatus. Separated from StimResponse
for future extensibility (e.g., model checkpoint paths, inference metrics).

StimOutputResponse.title: StimOutputResponse
StimOutputResponse.description:
Paginated stim output response

Returns stim job status along with paginated output data.

StimResponse.title: StimResponse
StimResponse.description:
Stim job execution status

Inherits all fields from JobStatus. Separated from RolloutResponse
for future extensibility (e.g., generator-specific metadata).

questions: Write a function to reverse a string
